Klasse PackageCalculator

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
gui.PackageCalculator
public class PackageCalculator extends javafx.application.Application
The PackageCalculator class is the main entry point for the application. It is responsible for initializing and setting up the user interface components, managing the application layout, and handling the main stage for the JavaFX application.

  • Verschachtelte Klassen - Übersicht

    Von Klasse geerbte verschachtelte Klassen/Schnittstellen javafx.application.Application

    javafx.application.Application.Parameters

    static final String
    APPNAME
    The name of the application, used as a title for the window.
    CalculatorArea

    The CalculatorArea class represents a section of the user interface where calculations can be performed.
    ExplorerArea
    explorerArea
    The ExplorerArea class represents a section of the user interface that displays a tree view of the project structure.
    InspectorArea
    inspectorArea
    The InspectorArea class represents a section of the user interface where details or properties of a selected item can be inspected and modified.
    MessagesArea
    messagesArea
    The MessagesArea class represents a section of the user interface that displays a list of messages or logs.
    String
    rootPath
    The root path of the current project.
    StatusArea
    statusArea
    The StatusArea class represents a section of the user interface that displays status information.
    ToolbarArea
    toolbarArea
    The ToolbarArea class represents a section of the user interface that contains various tools and actions that can be performed.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This is the main method of the application that sets up the layout of the various areas such as the toolbar, explorer, editor, messages, and status areas. It also handles the window and its content initialization.
      Angegeben von:
      start in Klasse javafx.application.Application
      Parameter:
      primaryStage - The primary stage provided by the JavaFX runtime.
